add_channel_find: Tertarik pada kanal tertentu? Temukan disini.

add_channel_scan: Pindai kode QR untuk terhubung ke kanal.
add_contact_import_title: Temukan pengguna terbaru %appname% menggunakan kotak pencarian diatas. Atau, tekan "Buku Alamat" untuk menambahkan orang ke buku alamat Anda. %appname% bekerja di Android, iPhone, BlackBerry dan PC!

add_contact_x_users_found: pengguna (jamak) ditemukan. Tekan pengguna yang ingin anda tambahkan.
add_contact_added: Pengguna telah ditambahkan ke kontak Anda. Setelah pengguna menerima permintaan, Anda akan dapat melihat status daring pengguna dan berbicara.
add_contact_added_many: Telah menambahkan %users% pengguna ke kontak Anda.
add_channel_details_tos: Ketika berbicara di kanal umum mohon jaga pesan tetap singkat. Untuk keamanan Anda, jangan pernah membagi informasi privasi Anda seperti alamat atau nomor telepon. Hormati pengguna lain dan mohon jangan menggunakan bahasa yang menyinggung.
report_channel_information: Pilih mengapa kanal ini tidak pantas.

details_history_older_deleted: Messages older than %d %s are automatically deleted from your conversation history.

details_history_disabled_link: Buka opsi layar riwayat untuk memfungsikan riwayat

send_location_location_permission: Pastikan ijin lokasi %appname% di pengaturan sistem aplikasi sebelum mengirim lokasi.
send_location_unknown_error: Masalah terjadi saat coba mengirim lokasi anda.
send_location_disabled_error: Tak daoat mengirim lokasi karena fitur lokasi sistem anda di disfungsikan.
options_ptt_desc: Atur tambah dan hapus tombol tekan untuk bicara
options_behavior_desc: Kustomisasi autorun dan perubahan status secara otomatis

history_explanation_sign_out: Messages will be deleted from your conversation history when you sign out.

options_use_system_camera: Gunakan kamera sistem untuk ambil foto
options_battery_optimization_on: Optimasi baterei sistem tidak didisfungsikan untuk %appname%. Gunakan tombol dibawas untuk mendisfungsikan optimasi baterei dan ijinkan %appname% untuk tetap online ketika layar mati.
options_draw_overlays_off: Displaying over other apps is not enabled for %appname%. Use the button below to allow %appname% to display alerts over other apps when a hardware accessory is used to start an emergency.
options_draw_overlays_enable: Allow to display over other apps
options_history_confirm_clear_all: Anda akan menghapus semua riwayat. Apakah Anda yakin?
options_history_confirm_reduce_voice: Anda telah memilih ukuran yang lebih kecil daripada jumlah data yang tersimpan di riwayat pesan suara. Untuk melanjutkan, hapus riwayat pesan suara terlebih dahulu.
options_history_confirm_reduce_image: Pengaturan ukuran riwayat gambar yang lebih kecil akan berakibat pada terhapusnya beberapa gambar terlama. Apakah Anda yakin?

error_invalid_username_character: Gunakan hanya huruf latin, angka, dan simbol umum.

error_duplicate_username: Nama pengguna telah digunakan. Mohon mencoba nama pengguna lain.
error_short_username: Nama pengguna setidaknya 5 karakter. Harap masukkan nama pengguna lebih panjang.
error_short_password: Kata sandi setidaknya 4 karakter. Harap masukkan kata sandi lebih panjang.
error_password_too_short: Kata sandi terlalu pendek. Setidaknya gunakan %value% karakter.
error_password_too_long: Kata sandi terlalu panjang. Jangan lebih %value% karakter.
error_password_missing_non_alpha: Kata sandi memerlukan karakter non alfanumerik.
error_password_missing_upper_lower: Kata sandi memerlukan karakter huruf besar dan kecil.
error_tls_error: Tak dapat mencari koneksi aman ke server.
error_device_id_mismatch: Tak diijinkan masuk di perangkat ini.
error_invalid_channel_name_or_descriptio: Karakter salah di deskripsi atau nama kanal.
toast_channel_rem_trust_no_mod: Anda dihapus dari pengguna terpercaya di %channel%.
toast_channel_rem_trust_user_no_mod: %user% telah dihapus dari pengguna terpercaya di %channel%.

toast_channel_busy: Saluran %channel% sedang sibuk. Cobalah lagi nanti.
toast_channel_full: Saluran %channel% sedang kelebihan kapasitas. Cobalah lagi nanti.
toast_channel_readonly: Kanal %channel% hanya dapat didengar saja. Hanya admin kanal yang dapat berbicara.

toast_direct_communication_prohibited: Kontak ini harus memulai percakapan dulu. Anda dapat membalas panggilan langsung ataupun pakai kanal.

toast_auto_busy_off: Mode telepon diam mati. Ganti status %appname% ke Ada.

app_started_automatically_note: Ketuk tombol Pengaturan dibawah apabila Anda ingin mendisfungsikan auto-run di awalan nyala perangkat.
mic_permission_error_info: Anda tak dapat kirim pesan suara karena ijin rekam audio tak diberikan. Gunakan pengatur aplikasi sistem untuk berikan ijin mikrofon.
camera_permission_error_info: Anda tak dapat buka kamera karena ijin tak diberikan. Gunakan pengatur aplikasi sistem untuk ijinkan kamera.
storage_permission_error_info: Anda tak dapat selancar gambar karena ijin penyimpanan tak diberikan. Gunakan pengatur aplikasi sistem untuk berikan ijin penyimpanan.
storage_permission_error_info_camera: Anda tak dapat buka kamera karena ijin penyimpanan tak diberikan. Gunakan pengatur aplikasi sistem untuk ijinkan penyimpanan.
storage_permission_error_info_save_image: Can't save the image because the storage permission is not granted. Please use the system application manager to grant the storage permission.
location_permission_error_info: Anda tak dapatkirim lokasi karena ijin tak diberikan. Gunakan pengatur aplikasi sistem untuk ijinkan lokasi.
qr_capture_default_status: Letakkan kode QR di dalam viewfinder untuk memindai.
qr_capture_network_error: Tak bisa masuk karena masalah koneksi.
aso_network_error: Tak dapat masuk karena masalah koneksi.
qr_display_description_user: Biarkan teman memindai kode QR ini untuk menambahkan dia dalam daftar kontak.
qr_display_description_channel: Biarkan teman memindai kode QR ini untuk terhubung ke saluran ini.
qr_display_description_you: Biarkan teman memindai kode QR ini untuk menambahkan Anda dalam kontak mereka.
alert_user_info: Opsi peringatan teks untuk dikirimkan ke %name%
alert_channel_info: Teks peringatan untuk dikirimkan ke kanal %name%
alert_channel_type_connected_info: Semua pengguna berlangganan terhubung ke kanal
adhoc_no_users: Anda tak ada kontak yang dapat ditambahkan pada percakapan.
adhoc_add_users_error: Gagal tambah partisipan pada percakapan ini.
adhoc_no_support_footer_consumer: Users who are running an incompatible version of %appname%.
adhoc_no_support_footer_zellowork: Users who have not joined your network or are running an incompatible version of %appname%.
adhoc_no_support_alert: Silahkan perbaharui %appname% untuk berkomunikasi menggunakan fitur baru percakapan.
adhoc_no_support_desc: Pengguna dibawah harus memperbaharui %appname% mereka untuk bergabung percakapan. Kirim peringatan ke pengguna terpilih.
verified_phone_required_to_speak_message: Untuk bicara pada %name% anda perlu memverifikasi nomor telepon.
toast_status_only_you_connected_message: Only you are on this channel. Tell others to join you or try another one.
switch_accounts_event_message: Terima pesan untuk akun %accountname%. Beralih ke akun itu?
text_message_upgrade: (Upgrade versi Zello anda. sekarang mendukung pesan teks)
emergency_button_click_toast: Tekan dan tahan tombol ini lama untuk mengirim kedaruratan
overlay_permission_explain: Zello features like overlay PTT buttons require permissions to display over other apps. %link%
overlay_tips_explain:
✓ ️Tap to talk, tap again to stop
✓ Hold and drag to move or delete
✓ Open as many as you need!
overlay_toggle_only: Tap overlays once to talk, and again to stop
start_shift_name_tip: Enter your full name to start the shift
update_profile_tip: Enter your name to start using your new Zello Work account.
update_profile_consent: By tapping "Go", you agree to our #Terms of Service# and acknowledge that you have read our #Privacy Policy# to learn how we collect, use, and share your data.
2fa_body: To continue, enter the code we sent to %email%
2fa_code_invalid: Incorrect or expired code. Please try again
inactive_account: This account was automatically disabled due to inactivity, please create a new one to use Zello.
confirm_end_shift_message: Are you sure you want to end your shift? Your recent conversations will be cleared.
onboarding_teams_survey_industry_questio: What industry do you work in?
onboarding_teams_survey_team_size_questi: How many people do you need to talk to?
onboarding_teams_survey_company_size_que: How many people are in your company?
permission_priming_admin_welcome_text_1: Talk to your team from the app
permission_priming_admin_welcome_text_2: Manage your set-up from the web management console
permission_priming_greeting_text: Zello needs access to system permissions in order to work properly.
permission_priming_text_2: Be notified when you receive messages
permission_priming_text_3: Connect accessories such as headsets and microphones
permission_priming_text_4: Find your contacts on Zello to talk with them
permission_priming_text_5: Ensures that you receive messages when the screen is off
permission_priming_text_6: Prevents voice messages from interfering with phone calls
invite_error_user_limit: You've reached your license limit! Please sign in to your administrative console to add more users.
invite_share_explain: Enter the first and last name of the person you want to invite.
accessibility_dialog_body: To use device buttons for push-to-talk while Zello is in the background, turn on Zello service under System Settings > Accessibility.
contact_picker_permission_body: In order to select a contact, you must grant this application Contacts permission.
dispatch_error_driver_in_call: %name% is in a call with another dispatcher.
dispatch_error_dispatcher_in_call: You cannot start a call until you end your active call.
location_permission_message: To enable live location tracking, allow Zello to use your location in the background.
location_permission_description: Zello will use your location when you trigger an emergency to send it to your team. This will allow them to find you and provide assistance when needed.
onboarding_personal_use_desc: Catch up with friends and family, or join an existing channel.
onboarding_personal_use_desc_minus_join_: Catch up with friends and family.
onboarding_team_use_desc: Sign up to use Zello with your team for a specific purpose — work, special interests, and volunteer groups.
onboarding_join_channel_desc: Listen to the updates in the existing channel (e.g. hurricane or emergency).
onboarding_error_email_taken: Email is already associated with another account
onboarding_error_team_format: Team name should contain alphanumeric characters only
onboarding_error_team_length: Team name must contain 4 or more characters
onboarding_consent: By tapping "Continue", you agree to our #Terms of Service# and acknowledge that you have read our #Privacy Policy# to learn how we collect, use, and share your data.
onboarding_confirm_email_desc:
Enter the code we sent to 
%email%
team_delete_contact: %name% will be deleted from your team and instantly signed out. Proceed?
team_delete_channel: Delete the %name% channel and its history?
consumer_channel_questionnaire_category_: Tell us more about your channel
user_needs_to_sign_in: This user needs to sign in.
iap_purchase_open_unknown_error_toast: Can't initiate a purchase. Please try again later.
iap_cancel_desc: We will take you to Google Play. We are sorry to see you go.
iap_cancel_open_unknown_error_toast: Can't initiate a purchase cancellation. Please try again later.
iap_desktop_prompt: Log in to %network% in a desktop browser to create channels, enable location tracking and more.
iap_billing_error_toast: There was an error when setting up your network; please try again later.
zw_tab_action_footer_only_admin_can_purc: You network administrator needs to upgrade to Zello Work
zw_tab_admin_required: Your network administrator needs to upgrade to Zello Work.
zw_tab_consent_buy: By tapping "%name%", you agree to the #Terms of Service# and #Privacy Policy#.
zw_tab_consent_trial: By tapping "Start Trial", you agree to the #Terms of Service# and #Privacy Policy#.
zw_tab_trial_failed: There was an error starting a trial. Please try again.
work_domain_flow_email_subtitle: You’ll need to confirm this email later.
work_domain_upsell_item_four: Track all your users on a map
work_domain_upsell_item_five: Equip your team with emergency buttons
work_domain_upsell_modal_title: Continue with Zello for personal use?
work_domain_upsell_modal_content: You are leaving your trial of Zello for work. You can restart your trial at any time from the app.
work_domain_upsell_subscription_info: Subscribe during or after trial period for %value%/month
work_domain_upsell_password_needs_symbol: Password requires a non alphanumeric character
work_domain_upsell_password_subtext: Your password must include at least 8 characters.
work_domain_upsell_network_name_invalid: Invalid network name. Use alphanumeric characters only.
work_domain_upsell_network_name_invalid_: Network name must be 5 - 32 characters long
work_domain_upsell_network_name_subtext: This is the name your teammates will use to join your company's account. The name can't be changed later.
work_domain_upsell_consent: By tapping "Continue", you agree to our #Terms of Service# and #Privacy Policy#.
work_domain_upsell_signup_consent: By tapping "Start Trial", you agree to our #Terms of Service# and #Privacy Policy#.
work_domain_upsell_trial_error_dialog_co: There was an error signing in to your network. Please wait while the issue is fixed.
sso_error_auth_failed: SSO account authentication failed. Please try again.
sso_error_custom_tabs_unavailable: Chrome custom tabs are not supported.
sso_error_sign_in_failed: SSO account sign in failed. Please try again.

user_categorization_sub_title: Help us to improve your experience.

diagnostics_log_desc: Send a log to Zello to help troubleshoot an issue
diagnostics_log_failed: Diagnostics log not delivered. Try again later.
diagnostics_log_failed_no_network: Diagnostics log not delivered. Check your connection.
translations_switch_title: Stop hearing translations on all channels
translations_switch_message: You will stop hearing translations automatically and see messages in the original version on all channels with translations.
bluetooth_discovery_not_enabled: Bluetooth is disabled. Enable Bluetooth to connect to a device.
